title: what happens to orange essence in pre season?
body: i read this site https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115012640908-Preseason-Update-FAQ and they dont answer my question, they just say DISENCHANT ALL SHARDS INCLUDING SKIN AND WARD SHARDS!!!111!!!1!!!!11 and they talk about blue essence alot but what happens to orange essence? will it be added to blue essence and multiplied by 6.5 too? will it be an extra currency? will it disapear?!

replies.body: I don't believe orange essences will be impacted or converted.  The main change going on here is IP being replaced by Blue Essence, so that will be the major tuning during preaseason.

I didn't believe orange essence would be impacted or converted either.  I was told this in a riot post.  And then told this again in another riot post.  And was under the impression this was the case.  And it wasn't.  And that's not fair.  I (and everyone else effected) should be compensated/given a chance to disenchant the shards for previous value.
they say all shards will lose value but they dont mention what happens to orange essences :( is there somewhere else where i can get information?

The amount you get for disenchanting will be rebalanced (= lower), because you will get more shards by playing games. If you want to disenchant - then do it now.

(sry for my bad english)

Also look: https://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-en/mYrwk2cY-a-question-about-orange-essence-in-preseason
They reduced the value from the shards in a 50%.
